org.processmining.plugins.etm.experiments.thesis

Class StatisticsAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.processmining.plugins.etm.experiments.thesis.StatisticsAggregator

  • public class StatisticsAggregator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be fed detailed statistics per generation over different runs. It can also be fed timing information (e.g. how many seconds after start did generation X finish). Furthermore, it can be fed concrete trees that were found such that for those generations the 'most average' tree can be written to file.
    Author:
    jbuijs
